title: Furnished House Short Term Monthly Rental Great Location
app_fee: $38.00 credit and criminal background checks, eviction report
posting_body: ['DETAILS', '*Furnished 2 BR 1 Bath House/Duplex', "*Conveniently Located Sloan's Lake/West Denver", '*Monthly short-term lease (month to month) option to renew.', '*Sorry NO pets.', '*$800 Security Deposit.', '*$38 application fee per person - credit and criminal background check, eviction history.', '*No smoking inside.', '*Occupied lower separate downstairs unit with separate entrance.', '*Available September 7.', "WHAT'S INCLUDED", '*Charming furnished main floor of 1930s Tudor home', '*All utilities and wi-fi.', '*Central A/C.', '*New stainless kitchen appliances: gas range, refrigerator, microwave, and dishwasher.', '*Shared laundry (washer/dryer) onsite.', '*Roku TV, basic dishware, flatware, cookware, coffee maker, blender.', 'and toaster.', '*Two queen beds nightstands and two dressers.', '*Living room and dining room furniture.', '*Front porch with a seating area.', '*Lots of afternoon sunlight.', '*Linens not provided.', 'EXCELLENT OPPORTUNITY FOR PERSON(S)', '*Moving to Denver', '*Buying a place and needing temporary housing', '*Hired as a contractor, gig worker, or on a short-term assignment in Denver', '*Working as a healthcare traveler', 'CONVENIENTLY LOCATED', 'Walking distance to:', "*Sloan's Lake Park (3 blocks)", '*Little Man Ice Cream Factory (1 block)', '*Starbucks (4 blocks)', '*Alamo Draft House Cinema (4 blocks)', '*Tap and Burger (5 blocks)', '*Odell Brewing (5 blocks)', 'Easy access to bike paths', '5 to 10-minute drive to:', '*Downtown Denver', '*Ball Arena', '*Empower Mile High Field', '*Meow Wolf', '*Art District on Santa Fe', '*Colorado Convention Center', '*King Soopers grocery store', '*Target', '*Edgewater Public Market', '*Denver Highlands neighborhood', '10 to 15-minute drive to:', '*Denver Art Museum', '*Denver Center for the Performing Arts', '*Coors Field', '*Sprouts Farmers Market', '*Natural Grocers', '*Regis University', '15 to 20-minute drive to:', '*Shopping at Cherry Creek', '*Whole Foods', '*Denver University', 'Close to public transportation', '*Four blocks from RTD bus stop to downtown', '*Six blocks from RTD light rail West Line to Union Station.', 'Easy access to West 6th Avenue when driving to the mountains.']
